name: G A U R I S H A N K A R Y A D A V

full_output.summary: Enthusiastic and detail-oriented Full Stack Developer with a solid foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies. Recent graduate with hands-on experience in developing and maintaining responsive web applications. Proficient in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and back-end technologies like java and database such SQL. Adept at collaborating in team settings, problem-solving, and eager to contribute to innovative projects.

projects.name: Color Guessing Game
projects.description: Enhanced understanding of RGB color models and their practical applications. Improved skills in JavaScript, particularly in DOM manipulation and event handling. Gained experience in creating interactive and engaging web applications. Learned to design user-friendly interfaces and improve user experience.

projects.name: Car Rental System
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive Car Rental System to streamline the process of renting vehicles, managing customer information, and tracking rental transactions.

projects.name: Spotify Clone
projects.description: Developed a Spotify clone, front-end using HTML and CSS with scratch.

projects.name: Field State Management System
projects.description: Developed a Field State Management System using Vue.js to efficiently manage and track the state of various form fields in a dynamic web application. This system simplifies the handling of form inputs, validation, and state.

experiences.description: Training is going on now as a full stack developer.

full_output.name: G A U R I S H A N K A R Y A D A V
